Class Menu

extends java.lang.Object

      Constructor and Description
      Menu()

    • Method Detail

      • getMenuItemById

        public MenuItem getMenuItemById(int id)
        Get a menu item in the menu item list by id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item (as in the ArrayList)
        Returns:
        the reference to the menu item

      • replaceMenuItemById

        public void replaceMenuItemById(int id,
                                MenuItem menuItem)
        Replace a menu item (specified by the id) with another menu item object
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item to be replaced (as in the ArrayList)
        menuItem - the reference to the replacing menu item

      • deleteMenuItemById

        public void deleteMenuItemById(int id)
        Delete a menu item in the list
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item to be replace (as in the ArrayList)

      • addMenuItem

        public void addMenuItem(MenuItem menuItem)
        Add a menu item to the menu item list. The new menu item will be placed at the end of the list
        Parameters:
        menuItem - the reference to the new menu item to be added

      • getMenuItemIndexByReference

        public int getMenuItemIndexByReference(MenuItem menuItem)
        Get the id (as in the ArrayList) of a menu item using the reference to that item
        Parameters:
        menuItem - the reference to that menu item
        Returns:
        the id of that menu item (index number in the list of menu item)

      • getPromotionalPackageById

        public PromotionalPackage getPromotionalPackageById(int id)
        Get a promotional package in the package list using its id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the promotional package (as in the ArrayList)
        Returns:
        the reference to that promotional packge

      • replacePromotionalPackageById

        public void replacePromotionalPackageById(int id,
                                          PromotionalPackage promotionalPackage)
        Replace a promotional package in the list with another promotional package
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the promotional package to be replace
        promotionalPackage - the reference to the replacing promotional package object

      • deletePromotionalPackageById

        public void deletePromotionalPackageById(int id)
        Delete a promotional package by its id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the promotional package to be deleted

      • addPromotionalPackage

        public void addPromotionalPackage(PromotionalPackage promotionalPackage)
        add a promotional package to the list
        Parameters:
        promotionalPackage - the reference to the promotional package to be added

      • getPromotionalPackageIndexByReference

        public int getPromotionalPackageIndexByReference(PromotionalPackage promotionalPackage)
        Get a promotional package id using its reference
        Parameters:
        promotionalPackage - the reference to the promotional package
        Returns:
        the id of the promotional package (as in the ArrayList)

      • print

        public void print(boolean detail,
                  boolean printMenuItem,
                  boolean printPackage)
        Print the menu
        Parameters:
        detail - the boolean parameter deciding whether to print a detail menu or a short one
        printMenuItem - the boolean parameter deciding whether to print the menu item list
        printPackage - the boolean parameter deciding whether to print the promotional package list

      • getListMenuItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> getListMenuItems()
        Get the reference to the list of menu item
        Returns:
        the reference to the list of menu item
